sketch.compiler.controlflow

Class CFG

  • java.lang.Object
    • sketch.compiler.controlflow.CFG

  • public class CFG
extends java.lang.Object
    A control-flow graph. This has a set of nodes and a set of edges. An entry and exit node are designated. This representation is immutable: converting from arbitrary control flow back to our high-level statement representation can be tricky, especially when things like for loops are involved. The CFGBuilder class can be used to build control-flow graphs from straight-line code.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    David Maze <dmaze@cag.lcs.mit.edu>

        Create a new control-flow graph (or fraction thereof).
        Parameters:
        nodes - list of CFGNode
        entry - specific node that is the entry node
        exit - specific node that is the exit node
        edges - mapping of from-node to to-node making up edges in the graph
